Text: How many days after mature that birch trees will give Daisugi Logs
How many logs a birch tree will give when harvested for Daisugi Logs
How long (hours) does it take to harvest a birch tree for Daisugi Logs
If enabled, birch trees will produce planks instead of logs when harvested for Daisugi Logs
How many days after mature that oak trees will give Daisugi Logs
How many logs an oak tree will give when harvested for Daisugi Logs
How long (hours) does it take to harvest an oak tree for Daisugi Logs
If enabled, oak trees will produce planks instead of logs when harvested for Daisugi Logs
You can change the settings manually or use these difficulty templates at any time but you need to reload the save if you are changing it mid-game.
